p: For extract samples of P. amboinicus, a diluent solution used was MeOH:acidified water (0.1% of formic acid) 1:1, the run starts at 50% of solvent B and reaches 60% in 20 min, returning to 50% in 21 min and remaining at this concentration until the end, at 26 min. In this case, the flow rate used was 0.6 mL/min [ 40].
